text:
50% of prescriptions today
have positive outcomes.

Honestly, when I heard of that
fact, I wasn't even surprised.

When I had to take my grandpa
to a lot of his doctor visits,

a lot of his doctors
basically told him,

come back in two
months, and we'll

see if the drug is
working for him or not.

And this is even worse
for physicians outside

of the US and the UK, where
80% of clinical trials
today are being done.
My grandfather was dying.

Clinical trials
today are being done.

And in the age of
machine learning, and AI,

and genetic testing, this
is simply unacceptable.

So what we do is, we
make genetic testing
that is cheaper and simplified.

And how we are able to do
that is, we combine genetics.

We will combine individual
and demographic data

to be able to recommend
to a doctor confidently,

take 40 milligrams for
this patient instead of 20.
And that's huge.

And that's why our current
paying customers include

the government of Indonesia and
the largest public hospitals
in Singapore.

The problem has been
here for a long time.

It's costing 80 billion
dollars in the US
and 63 billion dollars in Asia.
And the science is already here.

So what you need is a team
that is passionate, dedicated,

and willing to innovate
from the ground up.
And that's why we're here.
My name is Levy.

I'm the co-founder and
CEO of Nalagenetics.

And we're here to bring
you personalized dosing

and prescription for developing
countries, starting with Asia.
Thank you.
[APPLAUSE]
